divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the backyard porch smoke a cigarette and looking the sky when I saw a traveling bright sphere, bigger than a star, moving from west to north east. I thought that the light was a military plane but it wasn't because it moving so fast (a plane can not fly like that) and then turned off the light and disappear. I was completely shocking and scare because I didn't believe in UFO until last night.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around January 24th 2010
